H0.text: Gold is the element that is not a metal among all of the elements listed.

H1.text: Helium is the element that is not a metal among the elements listed.

H2.text: Sodium is the element that is not a metal among the others listed.

H3.text: Aluminum is the element that is not a metal among the listed elements.

A4.text: Helium is a colorless, odorless, non-toxic, inert, monatomic gas and the first in the noble gas group in the periodic table.
